issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
I upgraded from sdk8.2.0.GA to 8.3.1.GA.
However, an error occurred during the build.
How can it be solved?

{code}
[ERROR] Reachability Flag Status: -R ------- networkStatusForFlags
{code}

Attach the tiapp.xml.
fields.summary: Error occurred after upgrading from titanium sdk 8.2.0.GA to 8.3.1.GA

comments.body: I see you're still on Node 8.x, can you upgrade to the latest Node 10.x and try again?
I tried on node 10.x and got the same error.
